tooltip.createhorsepower.horse_crank.not: Mob is not a valid worker
createhorsepower.ponder.horse_crank.head: Using Horse Crank
createhorsepower.ponder.horse_crank.text: To use a horse crank you first need to have valid blocks underneath it
Some materials might be better than others
When a valid worker is attached the crank will produce stress
You can attach any mob in the config to turn it into a worker
You can get rotation out with a cog from the side...
createhorsepower.ponder.tag.path_types.d: Blocks that are viable for Working Animals to walk on
createhorsepower.ponder.tag.viable_worke: Animals that can be used to pull the Horse Crank
